text: Santa Fe Marshal is a 1940 American Western film directed by Lesley Selander, written by Harrison Jacobs, and starring William Boyd, Russell Hayden, Marjorie Rambeau, Bernadene Hayes, Earle Hodgins, Britt Wood and Kenneth Harlan. It was released on January 26, 1940, by Paramount Pictures. ==Plot== == Cast == * William Boyd as Hopalong Cassidy * Russell Hayden as Lucky Jenkins * Marjorie Rambeau as Ma Burton * Bernadene Hayes as Paula Tate * Earle Hodgins as Doc Rufus Tate * Britt Wood as Axel * Kenneth Harlan as Blake * William Pagan as Flint * George Anderson as Tex Barnes * Jack Rockwell as John Gardner * Eddie Dean as Town Marshal == References == == External links == * * * * Category:1940 films Category:American films Category:American black-and-white films Category:English-language films Category:Films directed by Lesley Selander Category:Paramount Pictures films Category:American Western (genre) films Category:1940 Western (genre) films Category:Hopalong Cassidy films
title: Santa Fe Marshal
